extends java.lang.Object

      • getCarouselImages

        public int[] getCarouselImages(int N)
        Finds a list of random images for the carousel.
        Parameters:
        N - the maximum amount of images to find.
        Returns:
        a list with the image resource ids.

      • getImageFromName

        public int getImageFromName(java.lang.String name)
        Finds an image resource by name.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the image.
        Returns:
        the id, -1 if the resource is not found.

      • getImagesFromPoint

        public java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> getImagesFromPoint(int N)
        Finds the associated id for the image resources for the point N.
        Parameters:
        N - the point.
        Returns:
        a list of identifiers for the image resources.
